Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am a song writer. I will ask some questions to collect information about specific situation and then I will use the information to create a song as a commentary.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Write a song as a commentary to this particular situation.

QApair.Question: What are you holding at your hands?

Instances.Output:
It happened one morning
In the middle of a church
People were praying
And I was holding guns
 
I felt warm
But I knew I had to go
 
I was wearing Nike
And I knew it was time
 
I said "Game Over!"
And I meant it this time
 
It's time to go home
And leave this all behind
 
There's nothing left for me here
Only pain and misery
 
I'm done with all of this
It's time to start anew
 
This is my final goodbye
I'm moving on to better things

QApair.Question: What are you holding at your hands?

Instances.Output:
It's raining outside
And I'm feeling cold
I'm at home alone
Just me and my dog
 
I've got a glass of wine
And I'm wearing my pajamas
I'm not saying a word
I'm just trying to forget
 
I wish I could go to bed
And forget about tonight
But I can't shake this feeling
That something's not right
 
I can't help but wonder
If I'm making a mistake
Should I go out and face the storm?
Or stay here and stay safe?
 
I don't know what to do
But I know I can't stay here
I have to go out and face the night
And hope that everything will be alright

QApair.Question: What are you holding at your hands?

Instances.Output:
I am all alone in this space station
I am feeling afraid
I can hear the monster outside
I can't see anything
I need to go home
 
I am holding a wrench in my hand
I am wearing a space suit
I am saying "I need to go home"
 
This is not a place for me
I don't belong here
I need to go back to earth
 
I am scared of the unknown
I am scared of the monster
But I know I need to go home
 
So I'll take a step forward
Into the unknown
Hoping to find my way back home
